item.title: 8 Somewhat Unusual Excuses I Give for Not Working on My Screenplay
item.description:
8 Somewhat Unusual Excuses I Give for Not Working on My Screenplay

,

8 Somewhat Unusual Excuses I Give for Not Working on My Screenplay

For every word I've ever written on a screenplay, there was an equal number of excuses in my head not to write them. Screenwriters, you know. You might be using one right now to not work on your screenplay.

item.title: 2016 Cannes Film Festival Unveils Directors' Fortnight Picks, Including New Films From Paul Schrader and Laura Poitras
item.description:
2016 Cannes Film Festival Announces Directors' Fortnight | Indiewire

,

2016 Cannes Film Festival Unveils Directors' Fortnight Picks, Including New Films From Paul Schrader and Laura Poitras

The 48th annual edition of the Cannes Film Festival's lauded Directors' Fortnight section announced its picks this morning and, as ever, it includes a hefty number of new works from rising stars, festival favorites already garnering serious acclaim and some of the most buzzed-about international offerings on the circuit.

item.title: An Oscar That's Worth the Oscars?
item.description:
An Oscar That's Worth the Oscars?

A look into the surging career of up and coming actor, Oscar Isaac, and his rapid rise to fame, bringing forth the possibility for a future Academy Award triumph.

item.title: 'Logan': How Director James Mangold Wrested Complete Creative Control
item.description:
'Logan': How Director James Mangold Wrested Complete Creative Control

As the superhero genre begins to run stale, both director and studio agree: it's time for something different. As independent and low-budget filmmakers, we are frequently under the impression that making a studio-driven, tent-pole blockbuster will be hard.

item.title: Every Filmmaking Form You'll Ever Need in 99 Free Templates
item.description:
Every Filmmaking Form You'll Ever Need in 99 Free Templates

Ease your workload (and your mind) with these free templates for everything from storyboarding to contracts to accounting. [Editor's Note: No Film School asked Adrijana Lazarevic to collect these 99 templates because of her expertise working with filmmakers at Filestage.io.] No one really feels like doing paperwork, but let's be honest: no good film comes without organization and planning.

item.title: 18 Movies Every Entrepreneur Should Watch
item.description:
18 Movies Every Entrepreneur Should Watch

Apply now to be an Entrepreneur 360™ company. Let us tell the world your success story. Get Started " Yes, Hollywood may dramatize the plight of the entrepreneur. But sometimes the best way to capture reality is through fiction.
